ValidationRule.description: Claims reps should be blocked from choosing the following sub-statuses: Assessment/Approved or Assessment/Declined. IWCN-549 (no longer needed because fixed properly.)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $Profile.Name = 'Commercial Claims Rep', $Profile.Name = 'Residential Claims Rep' ), AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Claim_Stage__c), ISCHANGED(Claim_Sub_Stage__c) ), TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) == 'Assessment', OR( TEXT(Claim_Sub_Stage__c) = 'Approved', TEXT(Claim_Sub_Stage__c) = 'Declined' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not permitted to move to Assessment & Approved/Declined
